story_09_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ugh! What are you still doing here?
I thought I told you to stay out of my way!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Lear, you’re wrong! [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s
team is NOT pathetic!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Hmph. This is getting ridiculous!
One puny amateur...two, three...even ten!
It makes no difference if you’re weak.
story_09_04000/2401_0301_0400_10: Don’t talk about my friends like that!
story_09_04000/2401_0401_0500_10:
Friends? Friends are for fools!
If all you’re going to do is spout nonsense,
do it elsewhere! Out of my sight!
story_09_04000/2401_0402_0700_10:
Just how foolish are you?!
If all you’re going to do is spout nonsense,
do it elsewhere! Out of my sight!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
We’re not fools, and teamwork isn’t nonsense!
If we work together with each other, we can
achieve anything!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You’re getting on my nerves...
This conversation is over!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Rachel! Sawyer! Let’s corner Team Break at
the beach, where they can’t get away.
Don’t just stand there—move it!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Hold it right there, li’l lady!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Thought you could get away, huh?
Well, it’s finders keepers, Iris!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Hand over that Haxorus!
It belongs to Team Break now!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
We’ll put it to reeeal good use, all right?
So don’t argue, and give it here!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Argh! Not again!
They just keep coming and coming!
story_09_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Don’t worry, Iris. I’m right here with you, and so is
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. We’ve got your back.
story_09_04000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Now...let me show you why they call me
the Winter Trainer.
